Info.Title: Corner Gas: The Movie
Info.Writer: Brent Butt (story), Andrew Carr (story), Andrew Wreggitt (story), Brent Butt (teleplay), Andrew Carr (teleplay), Andrew Wreggitt (teleplay)
Info.Actors: Brent Butt, Gabrielle Miller, Fred Ewanuick, Eric Peterson
Info.Plot: As the town of Dog River goes bankrupt the residents of the town must pack up and move out. However our favourite citizens make one last-ditch effort to save Dog River.
